title: Trader Joe’s Just Announced a Major Store Change That Has Shoppers Ecstatic
description: Coming to a city near you! READ MORE...
author: Nina Derwin
excerpt: Coming to a city near you!
text: GroceriesTrader JoesNina DerwinNina Derwin is a Brooklyn-based writer with a passion for the art of storytelling. In addition to writing articles for various clients and publications, Nina has written several episodes of scripted television for networks including Starz and Fox.published nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: refrina/ShutterstockIn most parts of the country, there are plenty of great grocery stores that carry all of your favorite brands and then some. But, if you’re a fan of Trader Joe’s products, you’re limited to shopping at Trader Joe’s locations, and there are far fewer of those than regular grocery stores. Trader Joe’s carries so many special items that are truly one of a kind, which is why people get so excited when they find out a brand-new Trader Joe’s location is opening in their town. If you happen to be one of the many people across the country who have been wishing and hoping for the day a Trader Joe’s pops up in your area, you might be in luck, because the grocery chain just announced that it will be adding more than 30 new locations across the country.The most up to date information on Trader Joe’s store openings can always be found on the “Opening Soon” page on the grocery chain’s website. Keen-eyed readers spotted that more than 30 new locations have just been added, and those locations span a whopping 18 states as well as Washington, D.C. Many of the new stores are slated to hit the East Coast, plus three in Texas and three in California.Here’s the full list of all of the newly announced forthcoming Trader Joe’s locations: New York — 302 NY-25A Miller Place, NY 11764 New York — 388 Feura Bush Road, Glenmont, NY 12077 New York — 6400 Amboy Road, Staten Island, NY 10309 Massachusetts — 1165 Needham Street, Newton, MA 02464 Massachusetts — 1999 Centre Street, Boston, MA 02132 Pennsylvania — 550 Lancaster Avenue, Berwyn, PA 19312 Pennsylvania — 125 West Lincoln Highway, Exton, PA 73132 Connecticut — 801 Bridgeport Avenue, Shelton, CT 06484 New Jersey — 675 US-1 Iselin, NJ 08830 Georgia — 258 City Circle, Peachtree City, GA 30269 Missouri — 201 North Stadium Boulevard, Columbia, MO 65203 Louisiana — 2501 Tulane Avenue, New Orleans, LA 70119 Louisiana — 2428 Napoleon Avenue, New Orleans, LA 70115 District of Columbia — 5335 Wisconsin Avenue North West, Washington, D.C. 20015 Virginia — 220 Constitution Drive, Virginia Beach, VA 23462 South Carolina — 115 SayeBrook Parkway, Myrtle Beach, SC 29588 California — 31545 Yucaipa Boulevard, Yucaipa, CA 92399 California — 9224 Reseda Boulevard, Northridge, CA 91325 California — 2330 Foothill Boulevard, La Verne, CA 91750 Colorado — 9350 Sheridan Boulevard, Westminster, CO 80031 Oklahoma — 6920 Northwest Expressway, Oklahoma City, OK 73132 Texas — 11745 I-10 West, San Antonio, TX 78230 Texas — 8101 Eldorado Parkway, McKinney, TX 75070 Texas — 12812 Shops Parkway, Bee Cave, TX 78738 Arizona — North Bullard Avenue & McDowell Road, Goodyear, AZ 85395 Oklahoma — 1451 E Hillside Drive, Broken Arrow, OK 74012 Oregon — 2083 NE Burnside Road, Gresham, OR 97030 Utah — 4060 Riverdale Road, Suite B, Riverdale, UT 84405 Utah — 1895 East Rodeo Walk Drive, Holladay, UT 84117 Florida — 1511 Cornerstone Boulevard, Daytona Beach, FL 32117 Hopefully, one of these new stores isn’t too far from where you live. But, if not, don’t worry. The beloved grocery store keeps adding new locations all the time, and sooner or later there’s bound to be a Trader Joe’s that opens in your area. Until then, you’ll have to call upon your friends far and wide to send you all of your favorite Trader Joe’s products.
html:
• Groceries
  • Trader Joes

Nina Derwin

Nina Derwin is a Brooklyn-based writer with a passion for the art of storytelling. In addition to writing articles for various clients and publications, Nina has written several episodes of scripted television for networks including Starz and Fox.

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

In most parts of the country, there are plenty of great grocery stores that carry all of your favorite brands and then some. But, if you’re a fan of Trader Joe’s products, you’re limited to shopping at Trader Joe’s locations, and there are far fewer of those than regular grocery stores. 

Trader Joe’s carries so many special items that are truly one of a kind, which is why people get so excited when they find out a brand-new Trader Joe’s location is opening in their town. If you happen to be one of the many people across the country who have been wishing and hoping for the day a Trader Joe’s pops up in your area, you might be in luck, because the grocery chain just announced that it will be adding more than 30 new locations across the country.

The most up to date information on Trader Joe’s store openings can always be found on the “Opening Soon” page on the grocery chain’s website. Keen-eyed readers spotted that more than 30 new locations have just been added, and those locations span a whopping 18 states as well as Washington, D.C. Many of the new stores are slated to hit the East Coast, plus three in Texas and three in California.

Here’s the full list of all of the newly announced forthcoming Trader Joe’s locations:

  • New York — 302 NY-25A Miller Place, NY 11764
  • New York — 388 Feura Bush Road, Glenmont, NY 12077
  • New York — 6400 Amboy Road, Staten Island, NY 10309
  • Massachusetts — 1165 Needham Street, Newton, MA 02464
  • Massachusetts — 1999 Centre Street, Boston, MA 02132
  • Pennsylvania — 550 Lancaster Avenue, Berwyn, PA 19312
  • Pennsylvania — 125 West Lincoln Highway, Exton, PA 73132
  • Connecticut — 801 Bridgeport Avenue, Shelton, CT 06484
  • New Jersey — 675 US-1 Iselin, NJ 08830
  • Georgia — 258 City Circle, Peachtree City, GA 30269
  • Missouri — 201 North Stadium Boulevard, Columbia, MO 65203
  • Louisiana — 2501 Tulane Avenue, New Orleans, LA 70119
  • Louisiana — 2428 Napoleon Avenue, New Orleans, LA 70115
  • District of Columbia — 5335 Wisconsin Avenue North West, Washington, D.C. 20015
  • Virginia — 220 Constitution Drive, Virginia Beach, VA 23462
  • South Carolina — 115 SayeBrook Parkway, Myrtle Beach, SC 29588
  • California — 31545 Yucaipa Boulevard, Yucaipa, CA 92399
  • California — 9224 Reseda Boulevard, Northridge, CA 91325
  • California — 2330 Foothill Boulevard, La Verne, CA 91750
  • Colorado — 9350 Sheridan Boulevard, Westminster, CO 80031
  • Oklahoma — 6920 Northwest Expressway, Oklahoma City, OK 73132
  • Texas — 11745 I-10 West, San Antonio, TX 78230
  • Texas — 8101 Eldorado Parkway, McKinney, TX 75070
  • Texas — 12812 Shops Parkway, Bee Cave, TX 78738
  • Arizona — North Bullard Avenue & McDowell Road, Goodyear, AZ 85395
  • Oklahoma — 1451 E Hillside Drive, Broken Arrow, OK 74012
  • Oregon — 2083 NE Burnside Road, Gresham, OR 97030
  • Utah — 4060 Riverdale Road, Suite B, Riverdale, UT 84405
  • Utah — 1895 East Rodeo Walk Drive, Holladay, UT 84117
  • Florida — 1511 Cornerstone Boulevard, Daytona Beach, FL 32117

Hopefully, one of these new stores isn’t too far from where you live. But, if not, don’t worry. The beloved grocery store keeps adding new locations all the time, and sooner or later there’s bound to be a Trader Joe’s that opens in your area. Until then, you’ll have to call upon your friends far and wide to send you all of your favorite Trader Joe’s products.
